Enter

50p gets you on the table!

Beat The Champ

From 4pm to 5pm will be the ‘beat the champ’ event. Just pay 50p to get on the table against whoever wins. You take 3 shots against them from wherever you like, then they have 3 shots against you - if you score more, you win £2.50 - enough to buy yourself a pint!

Main competition

Enter for just £5 (£3 unwaged)! The winner gets half of the takings as prize money … minus whatever they lose in the Beat The Champ!
